thread.title: Perpetrators behind Lahore attack identified: sources
thread.title_full: Perpetrators behind Lahore attack identified: sources

title: Perpetrators behind Lahore attack identified: sources
text:
LAHORE: The perpetrators behind the deadly Charing Cross suicide bombing have been determined and a detailed report on the investigation has been submitted to the Prime Minister and Interior Minister, sources inside the interior ministry informed on Friday. 
The latest development follows the arrest of two facilitators involved in the attack earlier this week. 
According to police sources, the facilitators were apprehended from Dera Ismail Khan and Lahore. The terror group had entered Lahore from South Punjab. The arrested suspects were moved to an undisclosed location for interrogation, the sources added. 
On Thursday, a picture showing one of the alleged facilitators of the suicide bombing was released. A reward of Rs 1 million has been announced for information pertaining to the facilitator. 
At least 14 people were martyred including two senior police officials in a suicide attack in Lahore on February 13. The suicide bomber hit close to the Punjab Assembly when hundreds of demonstrators had gathered for a protest. 0 0 Perpetrators behind Lahore attack identified: sources was posted in pakistan of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on February 17, 2017 and was last updated on February 17, 2017.
